body:
"Train fuck are just ridiculously funny and doesn't even make sense. But words a wiser, sex is all about." -shady individual

indeed, sex IS all about.
"what about that was?" are you kidding me
Yup I agree. Train fuck are just ridiculously funny and doesn't even make sense. But words a wiser, sex is all about.

akinlabistclair
i've never been in one of those trains, but maybe it's loud, smelly, too crowded and too shaky to notice? other than that maybe they notice but pretend they didn't
also, reminder: it's fiction
although i heard about groping IRL but i've never heard about all out rape/sex-in-general
Every time i read a "train-sex" manga i always wonder to myself how duh fuck can they not hear, smell, see or feel that people are having sex on the train?
I was really hoping for some anal in this, feelsbadman.
Except for the fact that John K shows pretty much, *all* of the ovums that get fisted.

@narwhalqt ok that description is pretty much just saying john.k.pe-ta all over the fisting an ovum reaching,you're probably searching for wakuwaku onee-sans or just look at john k peta work at artist

Can someone help me to find a specific manga? I tried out some tags but still couldnt find it. Maybe someone got it favoured.
All i can remember is a scene, where a woman is havin sex with a guy (or shota) and starts to put fingers in his ass. After that he wants to repay her and puts both of his arms in her ass and pulls her womb (ovaries)
Thank you for the help!

I appreciate the translation, but wow, almost 2 years to get the english version, and there are a lot of decent works that are still waiting for translation...I suppose I should be happy if they'll ever get translated
Pretty good, gyaru girl was hot
